movies.title: Ra
movies.plot: Ra which means to Take away in Ancient Tolkappiyam , an apt title for the film which revolves around the lead character Ajay and his quest to find answers to the unsolved mystery in his life. Confused and baffled by the events happening around him, he is unsure if he is awake or still dreaming. With a deep intense meaning to all the occurrences around him, will he be able to break the shackles and come out victorious or succumb to the Devious foul play that is his mind itself is the Plot of the Movie .
movies.simplePlot: Ra which means to Take away in Ancient Tolkappiyam , an apt title for the film which revolves around the lead character Ajay and his quest to find answers to the unsolved mystery in his ...

biography.bio: Ashraf was born in (Abu Dhabi U.A.E) 11 December 1985. His father, Akbar, was working as a Managing Director in a Transport Company. He did his schooling in Tamil nadu, Chennai. He used to take part in all cultural events at his school and participated in major dance shows. He was keen in Computers and Graphics during his school days. Wrote a script called 21kms (2008).
biography.name: Ashraf

biography.bio: Gita Babu is an actress, known for Arrambam (2013) and Ra (2014).
biography.name: Gita Babu

biography.bio: Aditi Chengappa is an actress, known for Moone Moonu Varthai (2015), Thakita Thakita (2010) and Rudhramadevi: La Reine Guerrière (2015).

biography.bio: Victor Jayaraj is an assistant director, known for Deiva Thirumagal (2011), Thalaiva - Le leader (2013) and Thaandavam (2012).
biography.name: Victor Jayaraj

biography.bio: Lawrence Ramu is an actor, known for Ra (2014).
biography.name: Lawrence Ramu
